text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j , n ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = n - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; else a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; return 0 ; }
